name: vscode-healthier

healthier.enable.description: Control whether Healthier is enabled or not.

healthier.options.description: The Healthier options object to provide args to the Healthier command.

healthier.format.enable.description: Enable 'healthier --fix' as formatter, which formats code using Prettier

scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run compile
scripts.lint: npm run lint:server && npm run lint:client
scripts.compile: npm run compile:client && npm run compile:server
scripts.vscode:prepublish: cd client && npm run update-vscode && cd .. && npm run compile
scripts.postinstall: cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install && cd ..
